pattern.title: Element substitution group defined by conformant schema

assert.test: $namespace = nf:get-target-namespace(.) or exists(ancestor::xs:schema[1]/xs:import[exists(@namespace) and $namespace = xs:anyURI(@namespace) and empty(@appinfo:externalImportIndicator)])

rule.assert: Rule 9-48: An element substitution group MUST have either the target namespace or a namespace that is imported as conformant.
